events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position with all required documents submitted.
The candidate's profile has been reviewed and categorized under engineering roles as a software developer.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to manage this candidate's application process.
Initial screening was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidateâ€™s software development skills and experience.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview and readiness to participate.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM UTC to evaluate the candidate's coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong proficiency in software engineering concepts.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 18th at 2 PM UTC to discuss culture fit and benefits with the candidate.
